content: संयम् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To restrain, curb, check, control, govern, subdue (<ab>Atm.</ab>) (as passions &c.); असंयतात्मनो योगो दुष्प्राप इति मे मतिः <ls>Bg. 6. 36</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 100.</ls> {@--2@} To bind, imprison, fasten, confine; वातरं मा न संयंसीः <ls>Bk. 9. 50</ls>; <ls>M. 1. 7</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 20</ls>, <ls n="R. 3.">42.</ls> {@--3@} To gather (<ab>Atm.</ab>); व्री हीन्संयच्छते <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--4@} To shut, close; <ls>Bg. 8. 12.</ls> {@--5@} To hold together, hold fast. {@--6@} To guide or drive (as horses). {@--7@} ({%a%}) To collect. ({%b%}) To bind or tie into a knot (as hair); संयम्यमानशिखंडः <ls>V. 5.</ls> {@--8@} To keep in order. {@--9@} To present with, give to.
